subTitle.v: Ngày chứng từ: %d, nhà cung cấp: %c - %n, mã ngoại tệ: %t...

query.text:
declare @roundExRate tinyint select top 1 @roundExRate = cast(rtrim(val) as tinyint) from options where name = 'm_round_tg' select @stt_rec = replace(@stt_rec, '''', '') update @d53 set ty_gia = /* b.ty_gia */ case when b.t_tt_nt <> 0 then round(b.t_tt / b.t_tt_nt, @roundExRate) else 0 end, tien_nt = b.t_tt_nt, tk = b.tk from @d53 a left join cttt60 b on a.stt_rec_phieu = b.stt_rec left join dmtk c on b.tk = c.tk
update @d53 set tk_du = b.tk, ty_gia_hd = b.ty_gia, ma_vv = b.ma_vv, ma_sp = b.ma_sp, ma_bp = b.ma_bp, so_lsx = b.so_lsx, ma_hd = b.ma_hd, ma_ku = b.ma_ku, ma_phi = b.ma_phi from @d53 a left join cttt30 b on a.stt_rec_hd = b.stt_rec left join dmtk c on b.tk = c.tk
update @d53 set tt = case when ty_gia = 0 then tt_nt else tt_nt * ty_gia end, tt_qd = tt_nt
-- CommandGetIdentityNumber declare @wsID varchar(1) select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' create table #idNumber (stt_rec varchar(32)) insert into #idNumber exec AI_ERP$App$GetIdentityNumber @wsID, @@id, @@master, @@userID select @stt_rec = stt_rec from #idNumber drop table #idNumber
select @so_ct = space(datalength(@so_ct) - len(rtrim(@so_ct))) + upper(rtrim(@so_ct))
select @ma_ct = @@id, @loai_ct = @loai_ct, @datetime0 = getdate(), @datetime2 = getdate(), @user_id0 = @@userID, @user_id2 = @@userID update @d53 set stt_rec = @stt_rec, ngay_ct = @ngay_ct, ma_ct = @@id, so_ct = @so_ct
declare @l int set @l = 0
update @d53 set @l = @l + 1, line_nbr = @l update @d53 set stt_rec0 = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(line_nbr) update @d53 set so_phieu = space(datalength(so_phieu) - len(rtrim(so_phieu))) + rtrim(so_phieu) where stt_rec = @stt_rec update @d53 set so_hd = space(datalength(so_hd) - len(rtrim(so_hd))) + rtrim(so_hd) where stt_rec = @stt_rec
@@insertMaster
insert into d53$$partition$current select * from @d53 update cttt60 set stt_rec_pb = @stt_rec where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec_phieu from @d53)
-- AfterUpdate exec AI_ERP$App$Voucher$UpdateInquiryTable @@id, '@@inquiry$partition$current', '@@prime$partition$current', 'd53$$partition$current', 'stt_rec', @stt_rec, @@operation exec AI_ERP$App$Voucher$UpdateGrandTable @@id, '@@master', '@@prime$partition$current', 'stt_rec', @stt_rec, 1
-- Post exec fs_PostDDTran 'm53$$partition$current', 'd53$$partition$current', @stt_rec
-- AfterVoucherUpdate select stt_rec_phieu, sum(tt_nt) as tien_pb_nt, sum(tt) as tien_pb into #ctpb1 from d53$$partition$current with(nolock) where stt_rec = @stt_rec group by stt_rec_phieu
update cttt60 set t_tien_pb_nt = isnull(t_tien_pb_nt, 0) + b.tien_pb_nt, t_tien_pb = isnull(t_tien_pb, 0) + b.tien_pb, da_pb = case when isnull(t_tien_pb_nt, 0) + b.tien_pb_nt >= t_tt_nt then 1 else 0 end from cttt60 a join #ctpb1 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec_phieu where a.stt_rec in (select stt_rec_phieu from #ctpb1)
drop table #ctpb1
exec AI_ERP$App$IncreaseVoucherNumber @ma_nk, @@id, @so_ct
return
